title: Marvell1
author: Marvell1
content: How do you feel when the bear market is happening and do you hate it?. Every time a bearmarket happens, I always have valuable lessons that the bull market doesn't have. So always be grateful when the market goes down, it gives us many lessons, lessons about emotions, lessons about capital management, trust and patience.The bear market is not the end but the beginning of a new and better start, the bear market is a measure of our confidence in the market. Worthy rewards will only come to those who truly believe in the market.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: A bear market is good for anyone who:You do not want those investments during the next three years.For those who have a surplus of cash and wish to invest it.For those looking for a long-term investment with low risks.Profit is possible on the date of purchase, and most likely, if we break the previous top, we will not return to the levels of 30 thousand dollars again.

comments.author: SpenserReed
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMHow do you feel when the bear market is happening and do you hate it?To tell the truth, when a bear market starts, I start opening short positions

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: People's view about bitcoin varies while some see it as an investment others see bitcoin as a means of saving their spare cash. Sometimes the price of bitcoin goes up in their favor and they won't withdraw because they don't need the money yet. Such people only take their bitcoin when they need to solve a real life problem and, they may not consider the price at the time it was taken because they saved the money knowing that they would have spent the money long ago if they didn't invest the funds into bitcoin. Most of the time I don't feel anything when the price of bitcoin down trends because I'm the later.

comments.author: Iadegbola34
comments.body: Bull markets make you money, bear markets make you rich. While everyone enjoys bull markets, green candles and the weekly increasing net worth as it pads their ego, bull markets aren't where you get rich. Bear markets are the rare opportunity for wealth transfers, and are where crypto millionaires are made!

comments.author: teosanru
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMHow do you feel when the bear market is happening and do you hate it?. Every time a bearmarket happens, I always have valuable lessons that the bull market doesn't have. So always be grateful when the market goes down, it gives us many lessons, lessons about emotions, lessons about capital management, trust and patience.The bear market is not the end but the beginning of a new and better start, the bear market is a measure of our confidence in the market. Worthy rewards will only come to those who truly believe in the market.Obviously market in downtrend is a pretty bad feeling for anyone. You not only feel stuck with your money but at the same time you feel that guilt of keeping money in such a risky investment, people seeing the first bear run even feel that the whole market is a foolish scam made to loot our money. But you are right a bear market is nothing but a launchpad for the upcoming bull run only if the market would go bearish accumulation would become which could then pump the market.

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: We need to accept the market in all scenarios.No matter if the market is down or up, but we should adopt to it.I see many people fear the bearish market, I don’t understand the real reason for this type of response.In my opinion bear market gives us opportunity to buy more coins in our assets, and to invest for long terms.Currently we are also in a bearish market, and people are fearing and selling their Bitcoins.They should understand the potential of Bitcoins. Bitcoins are the digital asset that will become valuable as the time passes.So we should look the bearish market in a positive attitude and buy as many Bitcoins as we can.

comments.author: joeperry
comments.body: For holders of course they would be feel sad since they will be holding their coins maybe for a longer time but for casual traders like most of the traders we usually take advantage on a downtrend through shorting or by converting it to stable coins to avoid the volatility of the market or to avoid losing the value of our holdings.

comments.author: Ultegra134
comments.body: It depends, if I have invested in Altcoins I'd panic because I don't  trust them as much as I trust Bitcoin, there are quite a few instances of them suddenly crashing (see Luna or even FTM), for a variety of reasons which are not currently relevant. Bitcoin has lost more than 50% of its value, but honestly, I currently don't mind, since I'm not dependent on that money. I'm confident that in the near future, it will pay off by large. Thus, such bear markets aren't too upsetting for me, while it's a worthy opportunity to acquire more Bitcoin.

comments.author: LogitechMouse
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMHow do you feel when the bear market is happening and do you hate it?. I don't feel anything whenever the market is down, and the same when the market is up. No hate for me when there is a bear market because most of the profits of the investors are coming from after the bear market because you can buy coins or stocks for a lower price.  Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMEvery time a bearmarket happens, I always have valuable lessons that the bull market doesn't have. So always be grateful when the market goes down, it gives us many lessons, lessons about emotions, lessons about capital management, trust and patience.Bear market = opportunity for intelligent investors.When the people are panicking, intelligent investors are silently accumulating coins and thinking of holding it for mid to long term. After the bear market, they will just wait for another bull market and *BOOM. Easy profit for them.Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMThe bear market is not the end but the beginning of a new and better start, the bear market is a measure of our confidence in the market. Worthy rewards will only come to those who truly believe in the market.What goes up goes down in every market whether it is stock or crypto or other market. Sometimes, we need to shake off the market and let those newbie and investors who are panicking easily to leave. Those who will survive will be the ones who will see another day. Those who accumulate during the bear market are the ones who will got the most profit when the next bull market comes.

comments.author: P2PECS
comments.body: Well, I'd rather be in the bull market than in the bear market, but I don't put great expectations on it. There are people who invest everything in bitcoin or in the fashionable alt hoping that it will be their salvation and when we enter a bear market they despair. Markets are like that, you have to learn not to get too carried away by enthusiasm in the bull market or pessimism in the bear market.

comments.author: Wexnident
comments.body: I try to look at what I can do, or look at the positive things I can do instead of hating it. Trading itself already made me hate it whether it was a bull or bear market since most of my early days were me selling on bear seasons and buying on bull seasons. Even if I knew that what I should do is the opposite, well, fear got hold of me back then. Well that was when I was still trading daily, now that I just DCA, I still tend to look at the positive thing since I put in money when I wanted it to be not minding the season, takes a lot off my plate.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMHow do you feel when the bear market is happening and do you hate it?. Every time a bearmarket happens, I always have valuable lessons that the bull market doesn't have. So always be grateful when the market goes down, it gives us many lessons, lessons about emotions, lessons about capital management, trust and patience.The bear market is not the end but the beginning of a new and better start, the bear market is a measure of our confidence in the market. Worthy rewards will only come to those who truly believe in the market.There is already an answer in your question! Yes I hate it  ! But I see this as an opportunity to buy more coins or to realize some efforts to maximize the profit, improve earning scheme, finding new opportunities, even relax more since there is not too much to do in a current situation. Market can't be always a "pump", only ponzi scheme could grow and grow...

comments.author: MArsland
comments.body: I think of a bear market as a stage where we are given a second chance to be able to take more. Therefore, do not include all funds. Providing stablecoins for bear market moments. Although indeed no one knows when it will come and when it will end. In the end, only people who have finances can better adapt to a bear market, while those of us who are just mediocre will hate moments when we don't have more money to enter more.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: It's pretty simple if I am holding USD and the market down, I feel lucky to accumulate and fill my bags. If I am holding crypto then regret why I hadn't sold during an up trend. I think this is a simple logic for everyone. A bear market is an advantage for us who see the bull market. Because the market could move up anytime. Those who have enough patience could be gainers and make handsome profits from the bear. But most of the time we fall into the trap, once we buy the market go more down. Always we can't catch the bottom, to be honest. So whatever we may accumulate that would be better for us during bear.

comments.author: serjent05
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMHow do you feel when the bear market is happening and do you hate it?. I am not worried that the market had entered the bear season.  In BTC, whenever the market moves downtrend,  all we need is patience and wait for the market to recover.  This had been proven in the Bitcoin market.Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMEvery time a bearmarket happens, I always have valuable lessons that the bull market doesn't have. So always be grateful when the market goes down, it gives us many lessons, lessons about emotions, lessons about capital management, trust and patience.Aside from the lessons it gives, the bear market also gives us an opportunity to reinvest or buy back the BTC that we sold during the Bull trend.Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMThe bear market is not the end but the beginning of a new and better start, the bear market is a measure of our confidence in the market. Worthy rewards will only come to those who truly believe in the market.I agree because the market cycle repeats itself.  WE just need patience until this bear trend transitions to a Bull trend and we will see that the time spent waiting for the market to recover is worth it.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: Marvell1 on June 04, 2022, 02:01:23 PMHow do you feel when the bear market is happening and do you hate it?. Cypto market is a very exciting but it is also volatile and there are pitfalls to it. Bitcoin, some say is too volatile. I myself did not go wild with my investments. I am happy and I am doing my regular investing and I enjoy when market is down so I can buy some more coins.We all know that this is not the end of this story, and there will be huge bull run in the future. So don’t be upset when the Bitcoin bear market is happening and don’t hate it. Just sit back and relax and wait for the Bitcoin bull market to hit you.

comments.author: cassiolucena
comments.body: Nowadays, I don't feel like before. When we are in a bear market now, I just think as we should, if you have money to buy the deep, go for it, if you don't have money to buy the deep, just try to relax, never panic sell, that's the worst thing you can do to yourself.

comments.author: Bitstar_coin
comments.body: Speaking honestly I do not like it and I assume most investors don't too especially when it reduces your investment funds to -70% to -80% of what you have invested. It is hard to chew, but like an old-timer, we kind of get used to this season. I feel even worse when I don't have the necessary funds to buy the dip, this is also an opportunity for investors with a long-term goal to take advantage. Market downtown can be more interesting and less stressful when it was well planned. By planning, I meant selling at ath or around the top and patiently waiting for the right moment to buy back.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: Nothing special. I still have my coins and I still have my money. It's not like I lose all my life savings just because of a bear market. If anything, a bear market just presents itself as an opportunity for me if I have the extra funds to buy more. In the last 2-3 years, I guess I only sold twice, and that is when I needed some money for some personal projects/hustles that I have on the side. Never sell on a bear market, at least for bitcoin.
